product_name: The North Face Tasman Down Parka - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Tasman Down parka is the ultimate tool for staying warm without giving up your sense of urban style. Incredibly warm goose down keeps the cold out and body heat in. High-quality 550-fill-power goose down provides substantial warmth, flexibility and years of extended duty. Drawcords at hood, waist and hem seal out the cold and provide a tailored fit. Double-entry handwarmer pockets; chest zip pocket; fixed hood. The North Face Tasman Down parka has a zip front with snap-closure placket. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Tasman Down parka is the ultimate tool for staying warm without giving up your sense of urban style. Incredibly warm goose down keeps the cold out and body heat in.
